scripts.build: pnpm --dir ./packages/navigation-core build && pnpm --dir ./packages/navigation-vue build && pnpm --dir ./packages/navigation-react build
scripts.page: pnpm --dir ./examples/landing build && pnpm --dir ./examples/vue-demo build && pnpm --dir ./examples/react-demo build && node scripts/merge-dist.js
scripts.pub: pnpm --dir ./packages/navigation-core pub && pnpm --dir ./packages/navigation-vue pub && pnpm --dir ./packages/navigation-react pub
